title: Creating a CRUD template
content: Creating a CRUD app is mentioned regurlarly as a one of the must-haves for any tech portfolio.  Creating a template for it allows for it to be recreated over and over again as necessary since it's a pretty standard system

title: OK I'm really starting to like CSS
content: I'm starting to really enjoy it.  Seeing something on another site and then trying to recreate it is way more fun than I would have thought.

title: Using Code knowledge outside of class
content: I ran across some cool health bars on some Warhammer models in Tabletop Simulator.  I loaded up the script and of course it's not in JavaScript, but I was able to recognize it as LUA and could start to rubber duck what was happeneing and now I can edit and add that script to my models.  I want to make a plug in that will add it as necessary.
